analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0x6287f59eb93c85b02b0d7ce11b5df51823275eb5.sol:
	Contract CryptoDime has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0x6287f59eb93c85b02b0d7ce11b5df51823275eb5.sol#200-201)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0x6287f59eb93c85b02b0d7ce11b5df51823275eb5.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/5/0x6287f59eb93c85b02b0d7ce11b5df51823275eb5.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/5/0x6287f59eb93c85b02b0d7ce11b5df51823275eb5.sol#82) is not in mixedCase
